Message: The user completes the submission of the form

Hi there,

I have installed the NewsBreak Pixel Base Code and View Content event manually inside my Shopify site's theme.liquid file. However, my Shopify theme is older and does not support the Customer Events setup, so your Pixel Test tool is unable to verify it automatically.

The pixel is installed correctly, and the View Content event fires properly based on Shopify's product_viewed trigger.

Could you please manually verify the pixel for my account so I can complete the ad setup and launch my campaign?

Thank you very much for your help!

Hi there! It sounds like you've done a great job setting up the NewsBreak Pixel on your Shopify site. Since your theme doesn't support the Customer Events setup, and you're unable to verify it automatically, I recommend reaching out to our support team for manual verification. Please email them at adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about your setup and any relevant screenshots or information. They'll be able to assist you further in verifying the pixel so you can proceed with your ad campaign.
If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
what is my account id? is it the same as the organization id?

Your account ID is typically different from your organization ID. The account ID is unique to your specific account, while the organization ID refers to the entity or business associated with multiple accounts. If you need help finding your account ID, you can check your account settings or contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for assistance.
there is no settings link in the dashboard

If you're unable to find the settings link in your dashboard, it might be due to access permissions or a different layout. I recommend checking under the 'Account Management' section for any options related to your account details. If you're still having trouble, please reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They can guide you through the process and help you locate your account information.
Account management only has organization ID. i already emailed your support and THEY asked me for my ID, i dont' understand why don't see that on their end via m yticket

I've forwarded your concern to our support team, and they will reach out to you shortly to resolve this matter. Thank you for your patience, and please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.
